name: Neurotransmission 08
description:
Cyberspace Series

Created by Fivos Doganis (@fdoganis), inspired by the chemical and technological alterations of the human mind and body described in Neuromancer.

"Sandstorms raged across the scoured floor of his skull, generating waves of high thin static that broke behind his eyes, spheres of purest crystal, expanding...."
William Gibson, Neuromancer (Sprawl, #1)
